final_diagnosis: Disease name: Onchocerciasis (river blindness) Causative agent confirmation method: Positive serological tests for Ov150 antigen and recombinant Ov16 Evidence alternatives ruled out: No other differential diagnoses considered due to clinical presentation, exposure history, and positive test results.
